name: GetProjectMemberInfo
description:
Retrieve information about a specific project member.

This tool retrieves detailed information for a specific project member within an organization. It should be called by users with Enterprise plan access and the role of Company Admin. The information is essential for managing project members and understanding their roles and contributions in a team environment.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to get information about a specific member.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project from which you want to retrieve specific member information.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project member to retrieve specific information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the member for which you want to retrieve information.
